name: 2018 The 9th International Conference on Material and Manufacturing Technology ICMMT 2018
content: Conference official website：http://www.icmmt.org Meeting time：April 28-30, 2018 Meeting place：Moscow,Russia Academy of Sciences Published by：All accepted papers after proper registration and presetation,will be published in the conference Proceedings.Which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Conference Proceedings of ICMMT 2017 has been included into TTP scientific.net database and has been indexed by Scopus already. Paper Submission: January 10, 2018 Notification: February 5, 2018 Registraiton: February 20, 2018 Submission instructions： 1\. Official language is English in paper writing and presenting 2.All submitted articles report original,prebiously unpublished research results,experimental or theoretical. 3.If you have any require,contact at icmmt@ase.org Keynote Speakers Prof.Vladimir Khovaylo,National University of Science and Technology,Russia Prof.Ghenadii Korotcenkov Gwangju Institute of Science and Technology,Korea Prof.Dr.Gianluca Cicala,University of Catania,Italy Prof.Quang-Cherng Hsu,National Kaohsiung University of Applied Sciences,Taiwan Conference Contact: Contact: Ms.Sharon Chun Mailbox:Icmmt@asr.org
